description: Searches one-way journey options and returns schedules with pricing.
explanation: This POST request carries a JSON body with journeyRequest.type set to 'OW' (one-way) along with origin, destination, departureDateTime, and passenger details; the headers indicate JSON content, and the response returns success with journey solution data and fares. The captured payload shows type:'OW', origin:'NYP', destination:'BOS', pricingUnit:'DOLLARS', and singleAdultFare:true, matching a one-way price search . The response is application/json with success:true and data for the requested journey, confirming it provides schedules and pricing .
